name: Crack the Code! (GamesPlusJam2022)
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GamesPlusJam2022 game jam, as my first ever game jam game

I tried to stay within the theme of "Mix it up", but i overscoped and the idea ended up not working. I tried switching it to where you have 3 puzzles about aligning books, codes, and mixing a bowl to uncover a key. Sadly i was only able to complete 1 of the 3 puzzles and so i had to scratch that idea too. I'm totally fine if i get disqualified for this.

I didn't want to submit nothing so i finished the game anyway.Controls:

  1. move: WASD or arrow keys;
  2. move objects: hold left-mouse button;

Mentions:

  • Art made by me during the jam
  • SoundEffects made with SFXR (https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html)
